main event: A married couple observed a bright circular object in the sky over Landover Hills, Maryland, on 27 June 1965.
interesting points: The object was circular in shape, approximately 50 feet in diameter, and hovered about 100-150 feet off the ground., The sighting lasted for about 15 seconds before the object suddenly accelerated and disappeared., The USAF evaluated the incident as a possible unidentified flying object (UFO)., The object appeared to have flashing lights and was moving steadily across the sky., A prior observation of a similar object was reported in the area.
